Title: The mission hardens the will, the ocean witnesses the loyalty
Publisher: Zhongguo jiefangjun Nanjing junqu zong zhuangbei bu (中国解放军南京军区总装备部)
Notes: From a series devoted to the PRC military, published by the PLA General Armament Department of the Nanjing Military Region and intended for internal (内部) use only.
